Pre-Game Insights: Golden State Warriors finished the 2023-24 season with a record of 46-36 overall and 26-26 in Western Conference play. The Warriors averaged 117.8 points per game, 48.6 in the paint, 16.2 off of turnovers, and 12.4 on fast breaks.
Others: The New Orleans Pelicans finished the 2023-24 season with a record of 49-33 overall and 30-22 in Western Conference play. The Pelicans averaged 17.6 points off of turnovers, 14.0 second-chance points, and 32.0 bench points last season.
Injuries: Stephen Curry is out for Golden State Warriors due to a peroneal injury. Andrew Wiggins is day-to-day with a back injury. De'Anthony Melton is out for Golden State Warriors due to a facet injury. Trey Murphy III is out for New Orleans Pelicans due to a hamstring injury. Dejounte Murray is out for New Orleans Pelicans due to a hand injury.
